concept.title: Key benefits
concept.shortdesc: This section contains a list of the significant advantages of .

conbody.p: The following is a sample list of the types of industries that is designed to benefit:

ul.li: A media or telecommunications company that provides real-time results during major events.
An organization that provides a mobile payments or mobile banking solution.
A global logistics company that provides a real-time track and trace service.
An energy company that collects data from millions of SMART meters (for example, for billing or trend analysis for intelligent grid control or markets).
A financial services firm that analyzes high volumes of structured and unstructured market data in real time.
A retailer or payment card provider that offers a customer loyalty scheme.
An emergency service or logistics company that performs predictive routing and rerouting of vehicles.
A retailer that is building an intelligent CRM solution by using fast access to reference data and message augmentation.

conbody.p:
offers the ability for an organization to:
Reach the business opportunities that are not possible with conventional middleware.
Reduce operating expense, by consolidating existing messaging systems.
Make it cost-effective to deploy applications that involve a high volume of messages and users.
Capitalize on an appliance form-factor (scalability, performance optimization, and hardening for DMZ).
Support consolidation into fewer higher-throughput appliances.
Leverage special-purpose form-factor and alternative input/output strategies to provide consistent, high performance, with transactionality and high availability.
Support millions of connected endpoints, and process millions of messages each second, within a single appliance.
Perform real-time computation based on message content to support computationally intensive or data-intensive environments and gain insights based on message content.
